name: The Legend of Faty(trial version)
description:
This is a strategy, adventure and open world game. You can join all 6 races and defeat the enemies for them. You can also invite or attack all neutral NPC. 

It looks like a mobile edition of Warcraft III, but you only need to control one role. You can invite two NPC to help you finish your mission, but you need to make friend with them first. And you can't invite high level NPC until your level reach their requirement. 

Completing missions can help you earn money fast, and killing monsters and robbers can help you upgrade. The most important thing in this game is to invite powerful allies and it will be easier to win the game with them.

This is a trial version of game. But it contains 100% content of the game. You can choose the Warrior and Mage. If you like it. You can bug it on APP STORE or Google Play. It's sale on $2.99.
